issue.title: Consider moving to dio over http client
issue.body:
`dio` has more features and seems better maintained than `http`, and has come up when discussing multiple issues: #708 and #592

there is already a [`gql_dio_link`](https://pub.dev/packages/gql_dio_link) to work off of / contribute to, but might be easier to copy `gql_http_link`, replace the client, then make tests pass

comment.body: @micimize Can you show an example of how to use DIO instead of http? Would like to test http2

issue.title: New release request to fix upstream bugs

labels.name: Priority: High
labels.description: High priority to include it inside next release

issue.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

https://github.com/fluttercommunity/plus_plugins/issues/2216 in a upstream dependency was solved with the release of a new major version of connectivity_plus

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Publish a new beta with connectivity_plus in version 5.0.0.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

Dependency overrides works until then.

**Additional**
None

issue.title: refetchQueries option for client.mutate

labels.name: dart client
labels.description: Issue relates mainly to the standalone dart client

issue.body:
Broken out from #278 
Like apollo, we should add `refetchQueries` array within the `MutationOptions` of QueryManager's `mutate` function. We will not add support for simple mutation names as they but only the part they don't [want to deprecate it](https://github.com/apollographql/react-apollo/blob/master/src/Mutation.tsx#L205-L213).

Right now all "safe" queries are re-resolved from the cache on mutation indiscriminately, but nothing is re-fetched from the network

issue.title: refetchQueries option for client.mutate

labels.name: dart client
labels.description: Issue relates mainly to the standalone dart client

issue.body:
Broken out from #278 
Like apollo, we should add `refetchQueries` array within the `MutationOptions` of QueryManager's `mutate` function. We will not add support for simple mutation names as they but only the part they don't [want to deprecate it](https://github.com/apollographql/react-apollo/blob/master/src/Mutation.tsx#L205-L213).

Right now all "safe" queries are re-resolved from the cache on mutation indiscriminately, but nothing is re-fetched from the network

comment.body: Have the exact same issue. Much lower widget in the tree calls a mutation, don't know the best way to refetch higher up.

commits.message:
Merge pull request #1385 from erknvl/macros/bump-connectivity

feat(graphql_flutter): bump connectivity_plus to 5.0.0

pull_request.title: feat(graphql_flutter): bump connectivity_plus to 5.0.0
pull_request.body:
- Fixes conflict with upgrading connectivity_plugin to 5.0.0

It seems that there was an issue with the connectivity_plus package's minimum iOS version being set to 11, which caused problems when building on Xcode 15 and iOS 17. Upgrading the package to a newer version should resolve this issue.
